sentence: In December 2015, the Joint Working Party of international scientific bodies International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) and International Union of Pure and Applied Physics (IUPAP) recognized the element's discovery and assigned the priority of the discovery to the Dubna-Livermore collaboration ..

examples.sentence: ...in 2003 by a russian american collaboration at the joint...
